TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ToolboxItem extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 提供工具箱项的基实现。

span.span: Provides a base implementation of a toolbox item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可以在设计时环境的工具箱中显示的工具箱项的基类。 is a base class for toolbox items that can be displayed in the toolbox of a design-time environment. 工具箱项通常表示要在设计模式文档中调用时创建的组件。A toolbox item typically represents a component to create when invoked on a design mode document. 类提供的方法和具有创建组件或者组件使用时，要序列化和反本身为工具箱中的暂留序列化的工具箱项的显示属性提供工具箱所需的属性数据库。The class provides the methods and properties needed to provide the toolbox with the display properties for the toolbox item, to create a component or components when used, and to serialize and deserialize itself for persistence within the toolbox database. 实例可以使用名称、 位图和要创建类型，配置类，创建一个类派生自没有。An instance of the class can be configured with a name, bitmap, and type to create, without creating a class that derives from . 类还提供基本类，用于自定义工具箱项的实现。The class also provides a base class for custom toolbox item implementations. 自定义可以创建多个组件。A custom can create multiple components. 若要实现自定义工具箱项，必须派生自，并重写， ，和方法。To implement a custom toolbox item, you must derive from and override the , , and methods. 必须为配置的以下属性和方法才能正常工作：The following properties and methods must be configured for a to function correctly: - 属性指定的工具箱项时显示在工具箱中的标签。The property specifies the label for the toolbox item when displayed in a toolbox. - 属性指定的项创建的组件类型的完全限定的名称。The property specifies the fully qualified name of the type of the component that the item creates. 如果派生的类创建多个组件，属性可能或不能使用，取决于是否方法重写依赖于此属性的值。If a derived class creates multiple components, the property may or may not be used, contingent on whether a method override depends on the value of this property. - 属性指定包含项创建的组件的类型的程序集。The property specifies the assembly that contains the type of a component that the item creates. - 属性 （可选） 指定要显示工具箱中的工具箱项的显示名称旁边的位图图像。The property optionally specifies a bitmap image to display next to the display name for the toolbox item in the toolbox. - 属性有选择性地包含任何确定工具箱项是否可以用于特定组件的对象。The property optionally contains any objects that determine whether the toolbox item can be used on a particular component. - 方法返回的组件实例或要插入才使用此工具的实例。The method returns the component instance or instances to insert where this tool is used. - 方法将工具箱项保存到指定。The method saves the toolbox item to a specified . - 方法配置从包含在指定的状态信息的工具箱项。The method configures the toolbox item from the state information contained in the specified . - 方法配置工具箱项创建的指定的类型的组件，如果方法未被覆盖以不同方式行为。The method configures the toolbox item to create the specified type of component, if the method has not been overridden to behave differently. - 属性指示是否可以更改工具箱项的属性。The property indicates whether the properties of the toolbox item can be changed. 添加到工具箱中后，通常已锁定工具箱项。A toolbox item is typically locked after it is added to a toolbox. - 方法锁定工具箱项。The method locks a toolbox item. - 方法引发异常，如果属性是`true`。The method throws an exception if the property is `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了使用一个组件接口添加文本数据格式处理程序，或，向工具箱。The following code example provides a component that uses the interface to add a text data format handler, or , to the toolbox. 传递任何文本数据粘贴到工具箱中，到自定义拖放到窗体上，数据创建者回调委托创建包含文本。The data creator callback delegate passes any text data pasted to the toolbox and dragged onto a form to a custom that creates a containing the text. [!code-cpp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CPP/textdatatextboxcomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CS/textdatatextboxcomponent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/VB/textdatatextboxcomponent.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将类作为基类的自定义工具箱项实现。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class as a base class for a custom toolbox item implementation. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Reflection::AssemblyName ^ AssemblyName { System::Reflection::AssemblyName ^ get(); void set(System::Reflection::AssemblyName ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或者设置程序集的名称，该程序集中包含工具箱项创建的一个或多个类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the assembly that contains the type or types that the toolbox item creates.

value.span: ，它指示包含将创建的一个或多个类型的程序集。

span.span: An that indicates the assembly containing the type or types to create.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定包含要创建的组件的类型的程序集。The property specifies the assembly that contains the types of the components to create.

para.span: 如果你派生的工具箱项类创建位于不同的程序集的多个组件，则必须确保你的项目中存在，对这些程序集的引用。

span.span: If your derived toolbox item class creates multiple components that are located in different assemblies, you must ensure that references to these assemblies exist in your project.

para.span: 最好从的重载添加这些引用方法。

span.span: It is advisable to add these references from an overload of the method.

para.span: 即使你方法不依赖于的值属性，应确保，此属性设置为要创建的组件之一所属的程序集中，因为它将显示在**自定义工具箱** Visual Studio 中的对话框。

span.span: Even if your method does not depend on the value of the property, you should ensure that this property is set to the assembly that one of the components to create belongs to, because it is displayed in the **Customize Toolbox** dialog box in Visual Studio.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ComponentsCreated As ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventHandler

summary.span: 组件创建后立即发生。

span.span: Occurs immediately after components are created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件每次创建组件的此工具箱项时引发。The event is raised each time components of this toolbox item are created. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

span.span: Occurs when components are about to be created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具箱项的组件将要创建每次都会引发事件。The event is raised each time components of the toolbox item are about to be created. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法配置要创建指定的类型的工具箱项，如果方法未被覆盖以不同方式行为。The method configures the toolbox item to create the specified type, if the method has not been overridden to behave differently. 此方法执行以下操作：This method performs the following operations: - 集属性，该值指示指定的类型的程序集。Sets the property to an indicating the assembly of the specified type. - 集到基于指定类型的名称的 short 类型名称的属性。Sets the property to a short type name based on the name of the specified type. - 将所有上的指定类型找到属性属性集合。Adds any attributes found on the specified type to the property collection.

span.span: The was locked.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsTransient { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示工具箱项是否为临时工具箱项。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the toolbox item is transient.

value.span: 当关闭提供工具箱的应用程序时，如果此工具箱项不应存储在任何工具箱数据库中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if this toolbox item should not be stored in any toolbox database when an application that is providing a toolbox closes; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性默认为`false`。The property defaults to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Lock() cil managed

summary.span: 锁定工具箱项，防止更改其属性。

span.span: Locks the toolbox item and prevents changes to its properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当它被锁定时，无法更改的工具箱项的属性。The properties of a toolbox item cannot be changed when it is locked.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is currently locked.

value.span: 如果工具箱项是锁定的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the toolbox item is locked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是锁定，无法调整其属性。When a is locked, you cannot adjust its properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnComponentsCreated(class System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventArgs args) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnComponentsCreated (args As ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventArgs)

span.span: A that provides data for the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发 事件。The method raises the event. 调用工具箱项创建的组件后调用此方法与方法已返回。This method is called after a toolbox item is invoked to create components and the method has returned. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnComponentsCreating(class System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs args) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnComponentsCreating (args As ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs)

span.span: A that provides data for the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发 事件。The method raises the event. 此方法之后调用工具箱项之前创建的组件，被调用调用方法。This method is called after a toolbox item is invoked to create components, just before the method is called. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Bitmap ^ OriginalBitmap { System::Drawing::Bitmap ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Bitmap ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置将在工具箱中用于此项的原始位图。

span.span: Gets or sets the original bitmap that will be used in the toolbox for this item.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示工具箱中的工具箱项。

span.span: A that represents the toolbox item in the toolbox.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此位图应为 16 x 16 像素，并且应在 Visual Studio 工具箱中，不在设计图面上使用。This bitmap should be 16x16 pixels and should be used in the Visual Studio toolbox, not on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Properties As IDictionary
public: property System::Collections::IDictionary ^ Properties { System::Collections::IDictionary ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取属性的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of properties.

value.span: 名称/值对字典，其中名称为属性名称，值为属性值。

span.span: A dictionary of name/value pairs (the names are property names and the values are property values).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性字典将变为只读后工具箱项已被锁定。The property dictionary becomes read-only after the toolbox item has been locked. 属性字典中的值验证通过方法，并默认值从获得方法。Values in the properties dictionary are validated through the method, and default values are obtained from the method.

summary.span: 将此工具箱项的状态保存到指定的序列化信息对象中。

span.span: Saves the state of the toolbox item to the specified serialization information object.

para.span: 和方法必须在派生自的类中实现为了支持持久性提供某些开发环境中的工具箱数据库中的类。

span.span: The and methods must be implemented in classes that derive from the class in order to support persistence in the toolbox database provided by some development environments.

para.span: 如果派生的工具箱项类创建多个组件，必须设置此属性，除非你方法重写不依赖于此属性的值。

span.span: If a derived toolbox item class creates multiple components, this property must be set unless your method override does not depend on the value of this property.

span.span: Validates a property before it is assigned to the property dictionary.
The value used to perform validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当属性字典中设置一个值时调用方法。The method is called whenever a value is set in the property dictionary. 使用此方法，可以更改对象的值，然后再提交它，也可以拒绝通过引发异常。With this method, you can change the value of an object before committing it, or reject it by throwing an exception.
